H0.text: Who said that there are only three true sports, bullfighting, mountaineering and motor racing, the rest are merely games. Ernest Bevin

H1.text: Who said that there are only three true sports, bullfighting, mountaineering and motor racing, the rest are merely games. Hunter S. Thompson

H2.text: Who said that there are only three true sports, bullfighting, mountaineering and motor racing, the rest are merely games. George Orwell

H3.text: Who said that there are only three true sports, bullfighting, mountaineering and motor racing, the rest are merely games. Hemingway
